ValidationRule.description: Once the status is changed to close, Close Date, Close Reason, Close By cant be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Closed'), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Alert_Type__c , '0200 Disability') ) , OR( ISBLANK(Close_by__c ) , ISBLANK( Close_Reason__c ) , ISNULL( Close_Date__c ) )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Close Date, Close Reason and Close By can not be blank.
